Class ShadowActivityThread

java.lang.Object
org.robolectric.shadows.ShadowActivityThread
@Implements(value=android.app.ActivityThread.class,
            isInAndroidSdk=false,
            looseSignatures=true)
public class ShadowActivityThread
extends Object
